alert.note: Alert for Mohave (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 21 at 5:02PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of northwest Arizona, including the following county, Mohave. * WHEN...Until 715 PM MST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 502 PM MST, Doppler radar and automated rain gauges indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms near the intersection of Pierce Ferry, Stockton Hill and Antares roads. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Pierce Ferry, Stockton Hill And Antares Roads. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
